verses.name: Daniel 7:21
verses.text: I beheld, and the same horn made war with the saints, and prevailed against them;

verses.name: Daniel 7:22
verses.text: Until the Ancient of days came, and judgment was given to the saints of the most High; and the time came that the saints possessed the kingdom.

verses.name: Daniel 7:23
verses.text: Thus he said, The fourth beast shall be the fourth kingdom upon earth, which shall be diverse from all kingdoms, and shall devour the whole earth, and shall tread it down, and break it in pieces.
